paragraphs.body: Bending Battle is a free game hosted on Nick.com.
paragraphs.text: Bending Battle is a free game hosted on Nick.com.

paragraphs.body: Playing as ${link_0}, the player's goal is to defeat ${link_1} ${link_2} and his ${link_3} ${link_4} who continuously attack.
paragraphs.text: Playing as Aang, the player's goal is to defeat Prince Zuko and his firebending soldiers who continuously attack.

paragraphs.body: All actions are performed through the use of the left mouse click.
paragraphs.text: All actions are performed through the use of the left mouse click.

paragraphs.body: Aang has three types of attack in his arsenal that he can use to defeat Zuko. They are as follows:
paragraphs.text: Aang has three types of attack in his arsenal that he can use to defeat Zuko. They are as follows:

paragraphs.body: There are several combination moves that Aang can perform and, if he successfully completes a sequence, he will be awarded with a point bonus and some special effects will occur. The combinations are:
paragraphs.text: There are several combination moves that Aang can perform and, if he successfully completes a sequence, he will be awarded with a point bonus and some special effects will occur. The combinations are:

paragraphs.body: To perform the Mighty Attack, three consecutive Ultras must be used, whereas Strength of Wind needs three consecutive Quicks (yellows).
paragraphs.text: To perform the Mighty Attack, three consecutive Ultras must be used, whereas Strength of Wind needs three consecutive Quicks (yellows).

paragraphs.body: Alternatively, Aang can choose to guard instead, shielding him from the firebenders' attacks. If Aang successfully guards against all the firebenders' attacks, he will receive an attack bonus on the next turn. However, if Aang is hit three times by an attack of the same category, he will receive damage; he will still receive the damage boost, however.
paragraphs.text: Alternatively, Aang can choose to guard instead, shielding him from the firebenders' attacks. If Aang successfully guards against all the firebenders' attacks, he will receive an attack bonus on the next turn. However, if Aang is hit three times by an attack of the same category, he will receive damage; he will still receive the damage boost, however.
Aang dodges a fire blast from Zuko.

paragraphs.body: The Avatar is made to fight not just Zuko but also some firebenders under his command. It is the player's job to employ the above attacks against these dangerous forces. Two firebender lieutenants, like Aang and Zuko, retain a predetermined amount of health points and only lose when these points are depleted. Three other firebender guards are in the brawl as well, but they require only one hit to be defeated. The colors of the guards' hats determine which moves are the most and least likely to damage them. No soldiers will be present at the beginning of the fight; as it progresses, however, they will appear progressively as Zuko calls for reinforcements.
paragraphs.text: The Avatar is made to fight not just Zuko but also some firebenders under his command. It is the player's job to employ the above attacks against these dangerous forces. Two firebender lieutenants, like Aang and Zuko, retain a predetermined amount of health points and only lose when these points are depleted. Three other firebender guards are in the brawl as well, but they require only one hit to be defeated. The colors of the guards' hats determine which moves are the most and least likely to damage them. No soldiers will be present at the beginning of the fight; as it progresses, however, they will appear progressively as Zuko calls for reinforcements.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0}'s members will join the fight to aid their friend in his efforts, offering their own distinct abilities:
paragraphs.text: Team Avatar's members will join the fight to aid their friend in his efforts, offering their own distinct abilities:

paragraphs.body: Katara's ability will periodically refresh after a cooldown period. Appa's and Sokka's abilities can be restored if Katara's move hits all enemies successfully (there need not be six enemies present), or if Aang hits all six enemies at once with a non-combo attack. Using any of Team Avatar members' attacks will not interrupt Aang's combo sequences.
paragraphs.text: Katara's ability will periodically refresh after a cooldown period. Appa's and Sokka's abilities can be restored if Katara's move hits all enemies successfully (there need not be six enemies present), or if Aang hits all six enemies at once with a non-combo attack. Using any of Team Avatar members' attacks will not interrupt Aang's combo sequences.

paragraphs.body: Aang's capabilities in terms of strength change throughout the course of the game. This change is defined by the term "level up". The five levels are "Apprentice", "Warrior", "Master Warrior", "Skilled Bender", and "Bending Master". As the game continues, his rank will improve, and new combination attacks will be awarded.
paragraphs.text: Aang's capabilities in terms of strength change throughout the course of the game. This change is defined by the term "level up". The five levels are "Apprentice", "Warrior", "Master Warrior", "Skilled Bender", and "Bending Master". As the game continues, his rank will improve, and new combination attacks will be awarded.

paragraphs.body: At "Warrior", Aang gains access to the following combination attacks:
paragraphs.text: At "Warrior", Aang gains access to the following combination attacks:

paragraphs.body: To perform the Power attack combo requires the sequence of Ultra-Quick-Ultra attacks, whereas the Fury of the wind combo requires the sequence of Strong-Ultra-Strong attacks.
paragraphs.text: To perform the Power attack combo requires the sequence of Ultra-Quick-Ultra attacks, whereas the Fury of the wind combo requires the sequence of Strong-Ultra-Strong attacks.

paragraphs.body: At "Master Warrior", Aang gains access to the following combination attacks:
paragraphs.text: At "Master Warrior", Aang gains access to the following combination attacks:

paragraphs.body: To perform the Warrior chi combo requires the sequence of Ultra-Ultra-Quick-Quick attacks, whereas the Warrior of the wind combo requires the sequence of Strong-Quick-Strong-Ultra attacks.
paragraphs.text: To perform the Warrior chi combo requires the sequence of Ultra-Ultra-Quick-Quick attacks, whereas the Warrior of the wind combo requires the sequence of Strong-Quick-Strong-Ultra attacks.

paragraphs.body: The final levels: "Skilled Bender" and "Bending Master" are typically unlocked toward the end of the battle. No further combination attacks are awarded.
paragraphs.text: The final levels: "Skilled Bender" and "Bending Master" are typically unlocked toward the end of the battle. No further combination attacks are awarded.

paragraphs.body: The player receives bonus points each turn he or she avoids any damage. Up to 10,000 points can be rewarded for how much energy Aang has left at the end of a battle. Making the first move in a round adds 1,000 points to the total.
